name: Toxin Detection & Testing
description: Training in identifying and testing for synthetic poisons, venom, and industrial biotoxins used in covert chemical warfare.

cards.title: Identifying Synthetic Poisons in Consumer Products
cards.description: Recognizing hidden toxins in food, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and household items.
cards.bulletpoints: Heavy metals, endocrine disruptors, neurotoxic additives
cards.summaryText: Scan labels, test batches for heavy metals and endocrine disruptors, and avoid neurotoxic additives hidden in consumer goods.

cards.title: Water & Airborne Toxin Testing Methods
cards.description: Techniques for detecting chemical and biological contaminants in drinking water and air.
cards.bulletpoints: pH imbalance, volatile organic compounds, aerosolized neurotoxins
cards.summaryText: Test pH, measure VOCs, and detect aerosolized neurotoxins to confirm water and air safety before consumption or prolonged exposure.

cards.title: Covert Poisoning Indicators & Early Warning Signs
cards.description: Recognizing subtle poisoning attempts through gradual exposure methods.
cards.bulletpoints: Fatigue patterns, cognitive decline, immune suppression effects
cards.summaryText: Monitor fatigue trends, cognitive dips, and immune suppression markers to catch covert poisoning before irreversible damage occurs.
